data.title: Looking For Metal Trades
data.meta_description:
A lot of info has changed since I last posted here so I just created a new thread to hopefully avoid any confusion. 
I trade metal bootlegs and am currently...
data.text:
A lot of info has changed since I last posted here so I just created a new thread to hopefully avoid any confusion.

I trade metal bootlegs and am currently looking for the following bands: Rammstein, Oomph!, KoRn, Katatonia, Marilyn Manson, Slipknot, Evanescence, Within Temptation, Epica, AWOLNATION, Anathema, Lacuna Coil, Nightwish, Theatre Of Tragedy, HIM, Immortal, Cradle Of Filth, Type O Negative, In Flames, Mortician, Pain, Beseech, Swallow The Sun, The Gathering, After Forever, Tarja Turunen, Linkin Park, Godsmack, Sirenia, Deathstars, & Tristania in lossless audio, DVD or HD Video. I'm also now looking for any extreme, death, doom, or melodic death metal shows I do not have.

Visit My Site: http://herzeleidmeister.com

Thanks!

!!!UPDATES NOVEMBER SO FAR!!!

November 16, 2015 (Total Shows Added [76])
